TriggerLogic.Name: GUI Message
TriggerLogic.Message: Your commander is a strong unit and can also build many things. In this tutorial your commander is surrounded by 'ghost' units - build these on the spots indicated and follow the instructions to make yourself a base. Begin by selecting your commander and right clicking to move him.

TriggerLogic.Name: Marker
TriggerLogic.Text: Use your commander to build a mex here.
The grey spots on the ground are metal spots.
You can build metal extractors (mexes) on them to increase your metal income.
The other resource you'll need is energy.

TriggerLogic.Message: Well done! To complete this mission, use your lab to build some units and then destroy the deserted enemy base on top of the central hill. First you'll need to build mexes on a few nearby metal spots so as you have enough resources to use your lab. You only need one mex per spot. Build more solars/wind generators if you find you're short of energy.

TriggerLogic.Name: Marker
TriggerLogic.Text: Your commander can help your lab build faster. Select your commander and then right click on your lab to guard it.

TriggerLogic.Name: Marker
TriggerLogic.Text: To remove these hint markers, hold ` and the right mouse button, then drag your mouse over them.
